= Login

`p621.*Login*`

== attributes

[cols='1,1,5']
|===
|`_str_`
|`*api_key*`
|e621 API key

|`_str_`
|`*username*`
|e621 username
|===


== constructor

`p621.*Login*(_api_key_, _username_)`

=== parameters

* _str_ *api_key* - e621 API key, used for authorization
* _str_ *username* - e621 username, used for authorization
